DOC.criteria: Diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus 18 year age old Willing follow study procedure Received investigational drug device within last 30 day Current use recent exposure prescription medication within 24 hour prior screen opinion investigator could influence subject 's ability participate study performance test device Positive pregnancy test obtain screening ( test perform female , except surgically sterile three year past menopause ) Hematocrit < 32 % > 55 % Inadequate vein ( opinion investigator designate study staff ) venous blood withdrawal intravenous catheter insertion Symptomatic coronary artery disease history angina , history myocardial infarction coronary intervention ( e.g . percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty [ PTCA ] , stent placement ) coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) within past 6 month Cerebrovascular accident within past 6 month Diagnosis follow diabetic autonomic neuropathy : symptomatic orthostatic hypotension , heart rate anomaly , gastroparesis Being treat malignancy , except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer Major surgical operation within 30 day prior screen Active alcohol abuse substance abuse ( judge principal investigator ) Severe mental illness , mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation ( judge principal investigator ) Other medical condition would pose safety concern , interfere study conduct seriously compromise study integrity , judge principal investigator ( reason exclusion clearly document investigator designee ) Working competitive medical device company , immediate family member someone family member living within household someone work company
